Description: LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION! Don't pay others a Full Broker Commission, Call us today and save! For this no full broker commission promotion. For Additional costs, this rental may be made available furnished, call for details. Rate shown is UNFURNISHED. Land lord pays major utilities and building services; Tenant pays base electric/TV'net. NO UNDERGRADS. NO BROKER'S FEE PROMOTION ENDS SOON. Graduate level students considered with domestic guarantor / co-signer.
